note.p: Daughter of Henry Boulton and his wife, Winifred Mary, of Cottingham, Nottinghamshire. Married Donald Christopher Baynes of Thruxton, Hampshire, in Walcot, Bath, in 1830. Neighbour of the Reeks family.
